TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit MMC_TASK extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 작업 패드에 개별 작업을 설정하는 데 필요한 모든 데이터를 지정합니다.

span.span: Specifies all the data that is required to set up an individual task on a task pad.

remarks.format: ## Remarks MMC 사용 하 여 프로그래밍에 대 한 자세한 내용은\_작업 구조와 참조는 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)에 [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)합니다.For more information about programming with the MMC\_TASK structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
